Question: Why is ignorance the beginning of dependent origination in the past,
and craving the beginning of dependent origination in the future?
Answer: Because these two afflictions are both fundamental.
Namely, ignorance is the basis of the past,
and craving for existence is the basis of the future.
Furthermore,
the state of afflictions in the past has already ceased and is thus difficult to understand,
therefore ignorance is mentioned.
When the state of afflictions of the later end is presently manifest,
because one seeks future existence, it is called craving.
Furthermore,
ignorance has seven functions,
and is said to be at the beginning of the dependent origination of the past.
First, it encompasses the five categories.
Second, it is present in all six consciousnesses.
Third, it extends to all three realms.
Fourth, it is the nature of latent tendencies.
Fifth, it can give rise to heavy bodily and verbal karma.
Sixth, it serves as the supreme preparatory stage for severing good roots.
Seventh, it is the nature of universal mental factors.
Craving only has six functions,
and is said to be at the beginning of the dependent origination of the future.
That is, among the previous seven functions, it excludes the nature of universal mental factors.
Furthermore,
ignorance has three functions,
and is said to be at the beginning of the dependent origination of the past.
First, it is always the leader.
Second, it is associated with all afflictions.
Third, it is the nature of universal mental factors.
Because craving is able to lead to rebirth,
it is said to be at the beginning of the dependent origination of the future.
Furthermore, ignorance has four functions,
It is explained at the beginning of the dependent origination in the past.
One is with contaminated and uncontaminated objects.
Two are with conditioned and unconditioned objects.
Three are with universal and non-universal objects.
Four are with objects of one's own realm and other realms.
Craving only has contaminated objects and conditioned objects.
It is not universal and has objects of one's own realm.
It is explained at the beginning of the dependent origination in the future.
There is another meaning.
It will be explained in detail later.
As for grasping being a condition for becoming,
if there are afflictions,

Old age and death cause dharmas to enter from the present into the past,
